sourcesContent:
<template>
    evento organizzatore
    {{ this.evento.nome_evento }}
</template>

<script>
import { db } from '../../firebase/firebase';
import { doc, getDoc } from 'firebase/firestore';

export default {
    name: "EventoOrganizzatore",
    props: ["eventoId"],
    data() {
        return {
            evento: null
        }
    },
    methods: {
        async fetchDatiEvento() {
            try {
                const eventoRef = doc(db, "eventi", this.eventoId)
                const snapshot = await getDoc(eventoRef)

                if(snapshot.exists()) {
                    this.evento = snapshot.data()
                }
            } catch(error) {
                console.log(error)
            }
        }
    },
    mounted() {
        this.fetchDatiEvento();
    }
}
</script>
